name: getKeyById
description: Can only be used by an **administrative** user.

$ul: **is_read_only**: Whether or not this key can only read and not write.
**label**: Custom label for this API key.
**time_created**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was created.
**time_updated**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was updated.
